scripts.postinstall: if [ -f /etc/alpine-release ]; then apk add --no-cache python3 py3-pip ffmpeg && pip3 install --no-cache-dir yt-dlp; elif command -v apt-get >/dev/null 2>&1; then apt-get update && apt-get install -y python3 python3-pip ffmpeg && pip3 install --no-cache-dir yt-dlp; elif command -v yum >/dev/null 2>&1; then yum install -y python3 python3-pip ffmpeg && pip3 install --no-cache-dir yt-dlp; else echo 'System package manager not supported'; fi
